Sentencas: Modeling plays a very important role in the development of fuel cells and fuel cell systems.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: The aim of this work is to investigate the electrochemical processes of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) and to evaluate the performance of the proposed SOFC design.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: For this aim a three-dimensional Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) model has been developed for an anode-supported planar SOFC with corrugated bipolar plates serving as gas channels and current collector.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: The conservation of mass, momentum, energy and species is solved by using the commercial CFD code FLUENT in the developed model.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: The add-on FLUENT SOFC module is implemented for modeling the electrochemical reactions, loss mechanisms and related electric parameters throughout the cell.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: The distributions of temperature, flow velocity, pressure and gaseous (fuel and air) concentrations through the cell structure and gas channels is investigated.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: The relevant fuel cell variables such as the potential and current distribution over the cell and fuel utilization are calculated and studied.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: The modeling results indicate that, for the proposed SOFC design, reasonably uniform distributions of current density over the active cell area can be achieved.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: The geometry of the cathode gas channel has a substantial effect on the oxygen distribution and thus the overall cell performance.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC

Sentencas: Methods for arriving at improved cell designs are discussed.
Titulo: Three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics modeling of anode-supported planar SOFC
